thread.title: Lady Cougars Fall to Wray and at Potter-Dix Tourna-
thread.title_full: Lady Cougars Fall to Wray and at Potter-Dix Tourna-

title: Lady Cougars Fall to Wray and at Potter-Dix Tourna-
text: Lady Cougars Fall to Wray and at Potter-Dix Tourna-  34:44  44:53 PM MDT Junior Jessica Kler and sophomore Taylla Heath block a hit in the front row. (Courtesy photo) During Tuesday's away game against the Wray Eagles the Cougar Volleyball Girls were defeated in three sets. The set scores were 11-25, 9-25, 23-25. They fell just short of getting the extra sets for a win. The Lady Cougars traveled to Potter Dix on Saturday for a neutral tournament starting at 8:30. They fell to the Morrill Lions by a score of 2-0. With a 3-5 record the Cougars travel to Holyoke, Tuesday, September 29th with a home game on Thursday, October 1st against Perkins County starting at 4:30 p.m. in Ovid. Senior Bailey Fassler takes an outside hit from the front row. She plays all around the court. (Courtesy photo) Advertisement
